name: k2hr3-app
description: K2HR3 Web Application is K2hdkc based Resource and Roles and policy Rules

scripts.help:
echo 'command list:
    npm run start
    npm run start:prod
    npm run start:production
    npm run start:dev
    npm run start:develop
    npm run start:dbg
    npm run start:debug
    npm run start:debug:break
    npm run start:debug:nobreak
    npm run stop
    npm run build
    npm run build:dbg
    npm run build:all
    npm run build:all:dbg
    npm run build:webpack
    npm run build:webpack:dbg
    npm run build:license
    npm run test
    npm run test:all
    npm run test:lint
    npm run test:jest
    npm run test:update
    npm run test:watch
    npm run deploy
'
scripts.start:production: bin/run.sh -bg --production && echo '' && echo 'Start on production - Success' && echo ''
scripts.start:develop: echo '' && echo 'Start on development without debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh -bg --development
scripts.start:debug:break: echo '' && echo 'Start on development with debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --debug
scripts.start:debug:nobreak: echo '' && echo 'Start on development with debugging no break' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --debug-nobrk
scripts.build:all: npm run build:license && npm run build:webpack
scripts.build:all:dbg: npm run build:license && npm run build:webpack:dbg
scripts.build:webpack: echo '' && echo 'Start Production Build' && echo '' && webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --mode production && echo '' && echo 'Production Build - Success' && echo ''
scripts.build:webpack:dbg: echo '' && echo 'Start Development Build' && echo '' && NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --mode development && echo '' && echo 'Development Build - Success' && echo ''
scripts.build:license: echo '' && echo 'Extract license of dependent libraries' && echo '' && bin/build_all_licenses && echo ''
scripts.test:all: echo 'All Test - ESLint and JEST' && npm run test:lint && npm run test:jest
scripts.test:lint: echo 'Run ESlint(NOTE: maybe install eslint in global)' && eslint app.js webpack.config.js bin/www routes/*.js routes/*/*.js src/*/*.js src/*.jsx src/*/*.jsx test/*/*.js test/*/*.jsx && echo 'ESlint - Success' && echo ''
scripts.test:jest: echo 'Run JEST' && jest --env=jsdom && echo 'JEST - Success' && echo ''
scripts.test:update: echo 'Update JEST snapshot' && jest --env=jsdom --updateSnapshot && echo 'Update JEST snapshot - Success' && echo ''
scripts.test:watch: echo 'Start JEST watch' && jest --env=jsdom --watch && echo 'Start JEST watch - Success' && echo ''
scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploy github pages for demo' && demo/demo_deploy.sh && echo 'Deploy github pages for demo - Success' && echo ''

author: Takeshi Nakatani <ggtakec@gmail.com>
